::Shredder::

Shredder frowns, picking up Mantella and flying back toward the 
Sulaco. Magmatron would probably want his troops repaired instead of 
dying out in the middle of nowhere.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> Mantella
> 
> 
> (Mantella's optics widen.)
> 
> 
> Mantella: No...Not the Destrons!! You just want to take me back 
there so you
> can stuff me into a CR Chamber and then I'll have to do nothing for
> eternity!...
> 
> (Being so weak, Mantella couldn't do anything to prevent Shredder 
from
> picking her up. Mantella stares as her optics start to get darker 
as they
> begin to dim out...)
